website_summaries.verdict: The comforter is soft and lightweight, but it doesn't do much to keep them warm so it's best as summer bedding.
pros: The reverse side has a flower print for when girls grow out of the Minnie Mouse phase, while the Minnie side makes young girls want to sleep in their own bed
cons: There's a slight color difference between the comforter and the sham, and there are no bedpost pleats on the bedskirt

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grand baby and she absolutely loved it.. It really is super soft. Very happy with this purchase and so is she :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would give 0 stars.
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in myself considering how detailed I am that I missed where it said this was only the blanket and sham! Considering I paid $50 !!!!! For this and only get a blanket and sham that are not even all that good quality, made very cheaply and definitely not worth the price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bossladi

customer_reviews.title: Nice pink color
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes it. Color is nice. But the item had little defects when i receieved it. I didnt want to deal with sending back and getting a new one
customer_reviews.author: sqprinqp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This blanket added the finishing touches onto my daughters room. It is absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nieisha Marcellus

customer_reviews.title: Cute but crappy quality-seams came apart one wash
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Exactly like the picture! Only problem is washed it first on delicate cycle and the bottom seams came apart. Now I have to sew it again before my daughter can use it. Would exchange if I wasn’t from Canada.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very Colorful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this comforter set for my granddaughter. She loves it! The colors are so vibrant. She hugged Minnie. Wish I had a picture. It was so sweet. She's satisfied so Grandma is satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: SharonT, Pittsburgh

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: On the expensive side for just a comforter and sham, but my 2 year old absolutely LOVES her "me mou" bed set!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Noel

customer_reviews.title: Check for stains!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves how the blanket looks and feels. It's a little thinner than I expected. I'm not sure why there is a stain? Didn't notice it until I put the blanket on the bed. Very frustrating! She had a pretty blanket for a few minutes, I suppose. Buying brand new for this price, will be returning unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Halye Linn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed with all things Minnie Mouse so this was a perfect gift for her. She loves it! And it was affordable so thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen D.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: It was for my 18 month old daughter and she absolutely LOVES it! She spends more time on her bed, now, than anywhere else. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Cute but bad stitching
customer_reviews.text: Bedding is very cute and correct fit, but the stitching is horrible. I washed it once before use and the pillow case had to be sewn back up. Half the stitching came out... overall if you have a sewing machine it should be fine. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a fanatic when it comes to minnie mouse I knew she would love it! She's 3yo and looking forward to cuddle up with it everyday. Thank you so much for your timely delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this beautiful bedding set!
customer_reviews.text: The bedding set was bright and beautiful. We bought it for our granddaughter’s bedroom at our house. It washed up nicely, the material is very nice and she completely loves it! Granddaughter, mommy & daddy along with Grammy and Poppy are very, very happy with this set. Thank you for this beautiful bedding set!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The stitching was bad on both the comforter and pillowcase. Also it says its a set, and thats what the pictures show, but there were no sheets with it. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I love it. My daughter loves it too. The pillow sham was missing out of package.
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN ALEXANDER

customer_reviews.title: Mini is a hit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and looked colorful and fun which matched her Minnie fathead!

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: It was a bday gift for 3 ur old granddaughter she loved it thank you
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: It’s a stain on a brand new comforter set
customer_reviews.text: I like the cover but I saw a small stain on it i paid 50+ for this product so I definitely wasn’t expecting a stain
customer_reviews.author: Littlejohn

customer_reviews.title: Made my kids year!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for a great price! will definitely be coming back to purchase other products.

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant and cozy!

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Perfect for the child who loves Disney.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old grandchild loved the comforter the minute she saw it and insisted it go on her bed right away. The comforter arrived in great shape and was exactly as pictured. The colors are bright, looks perfect in her room.
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: No fitted sheet
customer_reviews.text: No fitted sheet had to go to Walmart to buy thoses but all in all nice product

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my grandchild's new bed. She loves it. The colors are so vibrant.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for her new bed and am very happy with it. It’s super soft and not too heavy. It’s also really cute and she absolutely loves it.

customer_reviews.title: This is not a bed in a bag...

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.

customer_reviews.title: You only get 1 comforter and 1 pillow sham.

customer_reviews.title: she loved it so much that she's been sleeping in her ...

product_meta.title: Jay Franco Avengers Publish Full Comforter Features Iron Man, Hulk, Captain America (Official Marvel Product)
product_meta.description: Color:AvengersEarth mightiest heroes can now be found in your bedroom! Transform any child's bedroom with a bold and colorful Marvel Avengers Publish Reversible full comforter. This comforter will make any child's room stand out. This comforter is not only functional but cool with it vivid color and design that features your favorite Avengers Iron Man, Hulk, and Captain America. Sure to keep you warm, this reversible comforter is stuffed with polyester fill for loft and cozy comfort. Quilt stitching holds fill in place and adds decorative flair. Durable polyester fill is soft, comfy and warm and holds its shape after multiple washings. Reversible design allows you to instantly change the look by simply flipping the comforter over. Full comforter measures 76" x 86" inches. This is only the comforter, additional bedding coordinates and accessories sold separately. Easy care, machine washable.
feature_bullets: PERFECT FIT & FUN DESIGN - Reversible full sized comforter measures 76 inch x 86 inches. Add a touch of decorative enchantment to your room with our fashionable and super soft Marvel Avengers Comforter. Fun and colorful design features your child’s favorite characters Iron Man, Hulk, and Captain America.

HIGH QUALITY & EASY CARE - Keep your little one as cozy as can be! Avengers full comforter is super soft and great for all seasons. 100% brushed microfiber polyester allows for a comfortable night's sleep. Fade resistant and machine washable. To clean, machine wash cold. To dry, air/tumble dry on low.

GREAT GIFT – This Marvel Avengers comforter will make any child smile and will transform any bedroom, guest room, kids room, RV, or vacation home. Great gift for school or home. It rolls up for easy storage and travel.
SHOP THE AVENGERS COLLECTION - Complete your bedroom with our other Marvel Avengers products - Coordinating bedding and accessories available (sold separately).

OUR FAMILY COMPANY - Our company is still small and family run. We take great pride in our products and our unsurpassed customer service. We know that our wonderful customers are the reason we are in business! We offer excellent quality, non-toxic products. With our coordinating Avengers accessories, you can mix and match our high-quality and unique boy’s comforter sets, girl’s comforter sets, kids sheet sets, or kids pillows.
